logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (255848) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (255848) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: Pneumonia during hospitalization, defined by condition occurrences of Pneumonia conceptset occurring between start and end of inpatient visit
Pneumonia prevalent cohort: Episodes of pneumonia, defined by condition occurrences of pneumonia conceptset
